attributes.action: ensure that soldiers fighting in recognised combat zones (e.g Afghanistan, Iraq) should be free from paying income tax for the days served in such zones.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Armed forces members in these theatres are literally putting themselves in harm's way in service of their country.  It is the least we can do to recognise the fact.  The recent council tax offer was derisory.
